definition: to crush or compact by means of a roller
stone roller/roller and millstone/to grind/to crush/to husk
see 壓根兒|压根儿[ya4 gen1 r5]
to press/to push down/to keep under (control)/pressure

sentences.english: The rubble was moving. It was pressing down, slowly crushing them.
sentences.chinese: 瓦砾还在不断地向下滚动，碾压着他们的身体。

sentences.english: Crack resistance of two gradated RCC is better than that of three gradated RCC, and Crack resistance of RCC develops with age.
sentences.chinese: 随着龄期的增加，碾压混凝土的抗裂性能将得到提高。

sentences.english: The sandy gravel was filled in earth-rock dam and rolled by vibrating machine.
sentences.chinese: 土石坝填筑采用砂砾料，振动机械碾压。

sentences.english: Deformation properties are the important aspects to study crack resistance of RCC.
sentences.chinese: 变形性能是研究和分析碾压混凝土抗裂性的重要依据。

sentences.english: Research on the crack control measures of RCC dam in the view of structure.
sentences.chinese: 本文从结构方面进行了碾压混凝土坝防裂措施的研究。

sentences.english: The spillway face are RCC benched spillway face.
sentences.chinese: 溢流坝面为碾压混凝土台阶式溢流面。

sentences.english: Research on the crack control measures in the view of material.
sentences.chinese: 本文从材料方面进行了碾压混凝土坝防裂措施的研究。

sentences.english: Roller crushed concrete is adopted first within our country in dams with bottom conduits in Guanyinge reservoir.
sentences.chinese: 观音阁水库底孔坝段采用碾压混凝土尚属国内首例。

sentences.english: Special carbon paper rolled carbon paper to transfer device on the gravure cylinder.
sentences.chinese: 专门的炭素纸转移装置将炭素纸碾压到凹印滚筒上。

sentences.english: Do you know how many Gods and Monsters have been drowned under the waves of past eras?
sentences.chinese: 知否多少神怪，被时代无情的车轮碾压而过？

sentences.english: British Sandbags can be crushed normally by light crush vehicles.
sentences.chinese: 英军沙包现在能被轻型车辆正常碾压。

sentences.english: A pile of crushed cushions remained to show where Illyrio had sprawled.
sentences.chinese: 一堆皱皱巴巴的靠枕依稀辨得出伊利里欧曾经的碾压。

sentences.english: This glass is ground under water using pestle and mortar.
sentences.chinese: 玻璃在水下被杵和臼碾压。

sentences.english: The Linhekou Hydropower Station has a RCC double-curvature arch dam.
sentences.chinese: 蔺河口水电站大坝为碾压混凝土双曲拱坝。

sentences.english: The result of braking extruded powder coating after cooling.
sentences.chinese: 对挤出的粉末涂料冷却后碾压的结果。

sentences.english: For the RCC dam of Taolinkou Reservoir, RCC was developed in the conventional concrete.
sentences.chinese: 桃林口水库碾压混凝土坝为“金包银”形式。

definition: to hang sb up and beat him
(Internet) flash sale/(sports or online gaming) rapid dispatch of an opponent
to sweep away/to sweep across
to overwhelm/to overpower/overwhelming
unequalled/without rival/a paragon
unsurpassed/unparalleled
to shake up/to deal a shock/(fig.) to stir (sb's heart)
to sweep everything before one/to be invincible (idiom)
to blow out/to blow off/(computer games) to zap/(phone) to ring off the hook/to be jammed/to max out (credit card etc)
see 勢不可當|势不可当[shi4 bu4 ke3 dang1]
to overtake
valiant
overwhelming
see 壓根兒|压根儿[ya4 gen1 r5]
to press/to push down/to keep under (control)/pressure
to defeat/to smash/to rout
to have the advantage overwhelmingly on one side/to support unconditionally
